website_summaries.verdict: If your dog loves chicken, this human-grade and protein-packed meal is the easiest way to see if a dehydrated jerky-like diet is the right choice.
cons: Not for dogs with a poultry allergy

customer_reviews.title: Recommended by my trainer.
customer_reviews.text: I know this product is a little more expensive Then the grocery store type of dog food, but this is such a well balanced dog food that you don’t have to worry about loose stool or constipation. My dog is a healthy and happy dog and loves this dog food.
customer_reviews.author: Mrs. P

customer_reviews.title: My dog can't stop thanking me with "Unconditional Love" for feeding him Max Meat everyday
customer_reviews.text: There are some things I don't compromise on in regards to price and dog food is one of them. This is the highest quality dog food you can buy.....period. My dog can't stop thanking me with unconditional love for feeding him Max Meat from Only Natural Pet.
customer_reviews.author: JayBTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: My Dog Loves It
customer_reviews.text: We've tried wet food, dry food, kibble, he turn up his nose. But not only does he eat this air dried meat, he eats anything else in the bowl with it.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: New Sheriff In Town
customer_reviews.text: My boys like this product, a little better than Real Meat Air Dried. ...which is saying a lot. It has sort of a light crunch to it, and although they're good about sharing the bowl, I have noticed a little headbutting when I first put it down in the mornings. I let them graze on the recommended portions throughout the day, and then crush it up and dust it over what is usually brazed chicken breast with carrots and green beans for their dinner. As a result, I happen to eat a lot of sandwiches...but I wouldn't have it any other way. If you're willing to pay the higher price, I'd highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Mrmxwll

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog with allergies, so decided to try this. Our dogs love it so much, we have to use it as a treat/supplemental food rather than their standard diet because they will actually fight over it! So, we give them each a very small bowl of this in their kennels when we go to work in the morning. They happily get in their kennels and gobble this down immediately! The jerky-type pieces are also big enough to use as bite sized treats.
customer_reviews.author: akincl

customer_reviews.title: Healthy & Tasty
customer_reviews.text: I have 3 toy breeds, and all just love the MaxMeat food. Even my very picky eater guards his bowl from the others--he's never been food possessive before. A great success for us, and it is so healthy. I recommend MaxMeat to all. Great nutrition and apparently great taste!
customer_reviews.author: CSS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent but a bit pricey
customer_reviews.text: I have two very picky eaters who love this food. Not sure what makes this different fromthe dozens of others I have tried but don’t care because the daily battle to get the pups to eat is over! The product is more expensive on amazon than I have found elsewhere online.
customer_reviews.author: Scott Sherman

customer_reviews.title: The product is not the same as previously purchased.
customer_reviews.text: I had recently purchased the product at PetSmart and it was dry, like jerky, and in larger pieces. The product package that was just delivered was not the same as the previous purchase. The pieces were moist and very small so I don't know if I'll finish feeding our dog the product in case something is wrong with the food.
customer_reviews.author: Doug Sr

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: We use this as treats as well as mixed with regular dry food at our house. It's not easy to find things with no chicken or chicken fat for my allergic guy, and he loves this.
customer_reviews.author: Heather F.

customer_reviews.title: My Havanese loves this food.
customer_reviews.text: My dog loves this food and she is really picky. My complaint is that I had to go to the store to buy the food because it took too long for Amazon to get it to us. I am used to receiving Amazon orders in 1-3 days and this was about 10. Knowing this, I will order earlier for the convenience. My dog is a Havanese and this food is the first she will eat. The Jerky texture means I can take it anywhere and feed her. Great product!
customer_reviews.author: Truman Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Great Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: The shipments always arrive on time and packaged well. Our dog has several food allergies and this is one of the few foods that he can eat. He loves it. I like the fact that it isn't a wet, messy canned dog food and it isn't a dried kibble, it's a happy medium. We also use it for treats.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Dog Food
customer_reviews.text: Great ingredients. I only feed my dog the best. And on top of that she loves it. It’s jerky like so she thinks she is eating treats. She loves it. Highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: NRS

customer_reviews.title: Packaging
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this product and the packaging was awful it came on a envelope and the food was all grinded like powder I can not give this to my dog because he won’t eat it. Needs to put the product on a box.
customer_reviews.author: Antonio Felix

customer_reviews.title: She loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I have a very picky dog when it comes to her food. She gets this as an evening treat and gobbles it up. Cheaper to purchase on Chewy.com though if looking for a wholesome product for your dog.
customer_reviews.author: Beach Lover  (Sue)

customer_reviews.title: Great for picky eaters
customer_reviews.text: My picky fur-babies actually like this food; thank goodness. I have tried everything. Canned food, fresh, frozen, raw, kibble, but consistently they will eat this. The best part for me, is it’s so easy. I don’t get that horrible smell like other foods and it travels well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Mike Sheptenko

customer_reviews.title: Popular
customer_reviews.text: Good size and high taste rating from my dog. :-) I was getting "real jerky" brand but they were just bits. So far I've been more impressed with the quality & price balance of this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best Food Ever
customer_reviews.text: My dogs have zero gas now. Love this food and my dogs love it
customer_reviews.author: Nc farmer

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food!
customer_reviews.text: My Lucy who is a finicky Yorkshire Terrier lives this food. It look like jerky. Smells pretty good. You know if a Yorkie eats it it has to be good!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smells fresh!
customer_reviews.text: This food smells good! It has a very strong smell of fresh, real ingredients. My dog ate it so fast he almost choked. The only other thing he eats that eagerly is raw meat!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Reviewer

customer_reviews.title: My dogs love the taste.
customer_reviews.text: I like to mix canned with my dog's kibble but I decided to give this a try. I have Yorkies who are very finicky but they really liked liked this food. Packaging was very good and I use what I need.
customer_reviews.author: L. Rivas

customer_reviews.title: Favorite
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this food. I do like to hydrate it with some water overnight.
customer_reviews.author: Lauren1005

customer_reviews.title: Our corgi loves these
customer_reviews.text: Our trainer in our puppy class used these as treats, so we ended up switching to them instead of the treats marketed specifically for training since this proved to be more cost effective as well.
customer_reviews.author: caffeinatedpenguin

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Raw can be complicated and hard to ...
customer_reviews.text: Great product. Raw can be complicated and hard to find where I live. I stumbled upon this in a local big box pet store but in the 2 lb bags and limited to only beef and chicken. My dog loves it and I love that it ships to my door in 7.5 lb bags.
customer_reviews.author: Tamara Kidd

customer_reviews.title: Great Topper
customer_reviews.text: I began using this food as a topper about two years ago to add more meat to the diet. The dogs love it. My only complaint is that it is pricey.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Wheres the beef. I got it  and my  picky pups aren't giving it up.  They say yum
customer_reviews.text: My old Pomeranian and Shi-Tzu absolutely love love love this product. We have used other flavors but they did settle so well. Thank you Doctor Marty.
customer_reviews.author: Bwinking

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: My dogs love this product. I supplement other dry food with this. I hope they never tire of it , so easy to use & nutritious.
customer_reviews.author: stella c quick

customer_reviews.title: A very healthy snack and reward yummy
customer_reviews.text: A quality snack and can be used in dehydrated food..
customer_reviews.author: Michael Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Wish it were cheaper
customer_reviews.text: Both my senior pug & new bull terrier mix pup love this.
customer_reviews.author: JoAnna

customer_reviews.title: The smell
customer_reviews.text: It’s for my Multipom’s food. I mix it with Blue Buffalo kibbles and fresh cooked chicken and raw carrots
customer_reviews.author: Barbara G

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great if you really care for your dog's health. Great brand. Great food. All Only Natural Pet product is great always. Smart brand.
customer_reviews.author: Svetlana Alenina

customer_reviews.title: My dog loves this food!!
customer_reviews.text: My very picky morkie dog LOVES this food! It’s hard to find anything she will eat and she gobbled this stuff down.
customer_reviews.author: Troy Peterson

customer_reviews.title: My dog is very finicky--but she loves this food. ...
customer_reviews.text: My dog is very finicky--but she loves this food. Hope I will be able to continue buying it on Amazon. Thanks MR
customer_reviews.author: Moira R.

customer_reviews.title: Great food
customer_reviews.text: This food is great, the dogs love it, wil continue to purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia McKinney

customer_reviews.title: I use it for toppings more like salt for the dog
customer_reviews.text: I use it for toppings more like salt for the dog. My dog craves it all the time to put her meal each time.
customer_reviews.author: Patty Patrovits

customer_reviews.title: Great dog food!
customer_reviews.text: My fussy eater, a 60-lb labradoodle, LOVES this food. The texture is like soft beef jerky. Great product. And it even comes with a plastic cup for measuring/scooping.
customer_reviews.author: Dena G.

customer_reviews.title: My finicky eater likes it.
customer_reviews.text: Of course she likes ice cream as well. But MaxMeat is very good for her.
customer_reviews.author: victoria roberts

customer_reviews.title: Oh yes.
customer_reviews.text: Oh man, she loves this stuff. It smells great and it must taste even better.
customer_reviews.author: Renee J. Martin

customer_reviews.title: Jeez. Shes in love.
customer_reviews.text: . My dog will not stop wagging her tail over these! She loves them!
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy G.

customer_reviews.title: great food
customer_reviews.text: I use these for treats. the treats on the market are so bad. If I could afford to feed all the time ,I would. Thanks for the great food!
customer_reviews.author: aw

customer_reviews.title: Charli seems to like the food
customer_reviews.text: Charli seems to like the food. First time trying but so far all is good. Firm stools which is really good for her.
customer_reviews.author: Gerry

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Seams to be ok with the dogs. Been to short of a time to give a yea or nay.
customer_reviews.author: Charles E. Smith Jr.

product_meta.title: Only Natural Pet MaxMeat Holistic Grain-Free Air Dried Dry Dog Food - Made in New Zealand with Real Meat
product_meta.description:
Flavor Name:Chicken| Size:2 lb

 Real Meat. Nutrition. Quality. Taste.

Made in New Zealand with human quality ingredients, MaxMeat is a paleo-inspired, high meat, high protein diet that follows the whole prey formula which mimics your dog's ancestral diet. Each recipe starts with the highest quality meat available, including muscle and organ meat because, in the wild, your dog's ancestors were eating the entire animal. This allows for a concentrated, bioavailable source of protein and amino acids.

At Only Natural Pet we believe passionately that a natural lifestyle contributes to a longer and healthier life for your pet. Everything we carry meets our rigorous standards and is guaranteed to be safe and effective for your pet. Our mission is to make healthy choices easy for you and your pet.

We measure success by your pet's health, vitality, and quality of life. That's why we offer affordable shipping and no-questions-asked returns on every single product we carry. We want your pets to jump for joy every time the Only Natural Pet products arrives; if not, we'll take it back.

Simply click ADD TO CART to order yours today!
feature_bullets: AIR DRIED - Air drying is a gentle process that briefly heats Chicken MaxMeat to 160°, allowing for the optimal balance of protein, nutrient retention and flavor. This unique process allows the thin, quarter sized slices of MaxMeat to be served as easily as kibble, only offer far superior nutrition.

GRAIN FREE - Paleo-inspired, high meat, high protein diet that follows the whole prey formula which mimics your dog's ancestral diet. All of the chicken in this recipe is from New Zealand and raised cage free without the use of added antibiotics or growth hormones.

COMPLETE SOURCE OF REAL MEAT PROTEIN - Our recipe starts with the highest quality meat available, including muscle and organ meat because, in the wild, your dog's ancestors were eating the entire animal. This allows for a concentrated, bioavailable source of protein and amino acids.

PERFECT AS A COMPLETE MEAL, TREAT OR HIGH PROTEIN TOPPER - This dry dog food is made up of a carefully selected balance of natural ingredients great for a complete nutritionally packed meal, adding to kibble or canned foods as a delicious topping on food, and rewarding as a training treat.

SATISFACTION GUARANTEE - Only Natural Pet products always include a 100% Satisfaction Guarantee. Only Natural Pet uses only the highest quality ingredients in our dog foods and products. Providing you & your furry friend the highest quality products is our top priority.
